info.title: Deep Search (DS) API
info.description:
API for Deep Search.

**WARNING**: This API is subject to change without warning!

post.summary: Create Project Data Index Delete Token
post.description: Get a token used to confirm the deletion of a project data index.
Upload a file to a project data index.

post.summary: Ccs Convert Upload File Project Data Index
post.description: Convert files via CCS and upload to a project data index (only for indices with 'deepsearch-doc' schema).
Convert a list of HTML pages to PDF, convert them via CCS and upload to a project data index (only for indices with 'deepsearch-doc' schema).

get.description: Get url and path to upload an attachment to a project data index.

post.description: Notify upload completion of an attachment to a project data index.

get.description: List all bags in the project, backend-aware

patch.description: Update the metadata of a Knowledge graph

schema.title: Response Update Project Knowledge Graph Metadata

get.description: Get the config for a given project integration.

post.description: Update the config for a given project integration.

delete.description: Delete the config for a given project integration.

post.description: Ingest documents and collections for RAG

get.description: List all Knowledge Graphs in the system.
Get all kgs (only bag_key) for admin use.

schema.title: Response System Get All Kgs Admin

get.description: Get packages available in this CPS installation for installing in a project.
Get all data catalogs (only dc_key) for admin use.

schema.title: Response System Get All Dcs Admin

get.description: Get all KG flavours storage on db.
Get all projects and their flavours.

put.description: Save project flavours assignment on db.

get.summary: System Get Kg Storage Summary Async
System Get Dc Storage Summary Async

get.description: Gets kg total number by proj_key and flavour_key.
Get a celery task for a project.
Get a task for a project.
Get temporary files uploaded to a project.
Get paginated list of temporary files uploaded to a project.

post.description: Create file pointers for temporary storage.

file_url.title: File Url
file_url.description: List of File's URL to be converted and uploaded to the data index.

s3_source.title: S3 Source
s3_source.description: Coordinates to object store to get files to convert. Can specify which files with object keys.

scratch_files_id.title: Scratch Files Id
scratch_files_id.description: List of CCS's scratch files id to be converted and uploaded to the data index.

conversion_settings.title: Conversion Settings
conversion_settings.description: Specify the conversion settings to use.

urls.title: Urls
urls.description: List of URLs to be printed to PDF, converted and uploaded to the data index.

conversion_settings.title: Conversion Settings
conversion_settings.description: Specify the conversion settings to use.

PartialDirectConversionParameters.title: PartialDirectConversionParameters
PartialDirectConversionParameters.description:
Specify conversion settings (OCR, Assemble, ML Models) directly.

Fields left null are set to platform defaults.

object_keys.title: Object Keys
object_keys.description: List of s3 object keys to retrieve from bucket to be converted and uploaded to the data index.

S3DocumentSource.title: S3DocumentSource
S3DocumentSource.description: Specifies documents to import from an S3 bucket

allow_non_admins_to_make_resources_publi.title: Allow Non Admins To Make Resources Public

Bearer.description: Provide a Bearer token in the `Authorization` header
Bearer.name: Authorization
